mapper.select: select m_pwd pwd from members where m_id=#{id} UNION select pt_pwd pwd from partners where pt_id=#{id};
mapper.delete: delete from members where m_id = #{m_id} and m_enabled=1
mapper.select: select count(*) from members where m_id = #{m_id} and m_enabled = 1

select m_id id,m_pwd pwd,m_enabled enabled ,authority from ( select m_id,m_pwd,m_enabled from members UNION select PT_ID,pt_pwd,pt_enabled from partners) A INNER JOIN authorities on authorities.id = A.m_id where id=#{id}
select * from(select m_email email from members where m_id=#{id} UNION select pt_email email from partners where pt_id=#{id}) where rownum=1
select * from(select m_id id from members where m_email=#{email} union select pt_id id from partners where pt_email=#{email}) where rownum =1
mapper.update: update members set m_pwd=#{pwd} where m_id = #{id}
